mapper.insert: insert into DAILY(post_id, title, read_count, reg_date, content, temperature, latitude, longitude, nick, region, daily_file) values(daily_seq.nextval, #{title}, 0, sysdate, #{content}, #{temperature, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{latitude, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{longitude, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{nick}, #{region, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{daily_file, jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.select: select * from (select rownum rnum, daily.* from ( select * from daily order by post_id desc) daily) where rnum >= ((#{page}-1) * 10 + 1) and rnum <= (#{page} * 10)
mapper.update: update daily set read_count = read_count + 1 where post_id=#{post_id}
